item.title: Need help with alcher pleaseee@@@
item.dc:creator: @boy12 boy12
item.description:
@boy12 wrote:

this used to work well, but now it just does 1 alch and stop doing anything please help any1?

[center]program HiAlcher; const x1 = 230; y1 = 24; x2 = 316; y2 = 160; vari = 1979372; var stopped, modfound: boolean; lolx,loly,x,y,i, turhax, turhay, ModHat, ModHat2: integer; Procedure LClickSmooth(tax,tay,ranx,rany:integer ); Begin tax := tax +random(ranx); tay := tay+random(rany); //MoveMouseSmoothEx(tax+random(ranx),tay+random(rany),20,25,15,15,10); MoveMouseSmoothEx(tax,tay,20,25,15,15,10); wait(100+random(50)) //getmousepos(tax,tay); holdmouse(tax,tay,true); wait (10+random(10)); releasemouse(tax,tay,true); end; Procedure CheckForMod; begin if(FindBitmapToleranceIn(ModHat,turhax,turhay,5,200,240,430,10))or(FindBitmapToleranceIn(ModHat2,turhax,turhay,5,200,240,430,10))then ModFound:=true; if(ModFound)then begin writeln('Mod lÃ¶yty!') playsound('aanibeep.wav'); playsound('aanibeep.wav'); playsound('aanibeep.wav'); playsound('aanibeep.wav'); playsound('aanibeep.wav'); stopped := true; end; end; begin ModHat := BitmapFromString(13, 11, '979797000000000000000000000000000000979797000000000000' + '000000000000000000979797E0E0E0979797000000000000000000' + 'E0E0E0A2A2A2979797000000000000000000E0E0E0979797E0E0E0' + '979797000000000000000000E0E0E0A2A2A2979797000000000000' + '000000E0E0E0979797E0E0E0A2A2A2979797000000E0E0E0A2A2A2' + 'A2A2A2A2A2A2979797000000E0E0E0A2A2A2979797E0E0E0A2A2A2' + '979797000000E0E0E0A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2979797000000E0E0E0' + 'A2A2A2979797000000E0E0E0A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2' + 'A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2979797000000000000E0E0E0A2A2A2' + 'A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2A2979797' + '000000000000000000E0E0E0A2A2A2000000000000A2A2A2000000' + '000000A2A2A2979797000000000000000000000000E0E0E0A2A2A2' + '000000A2A2A2000000A2A2A2000000A2A2A2979797000000000000' + '000000000000E0E0E0A2A2A2000000A2A2A2000000A2A2A2000000' + 'A2A2A2979797000000000000000000000000979797979797979797' + '979797979797979797979797979797979797000000000000'); ModHat2 := BitmapFromString(13, 11, 'D09D24000000000000000000000000000000D09D24000000000000' + '000000000000000000D09D24FFFE87D09D24000000000000000000' + 'FFFE87F7FF0BD09D24000000000000000000FFFE87D09D24FFFE87' + 'D09D24000000000000000000FFFE87F7FF0BD09D24000000000000' + '000000FFFE87D09D24FFFE87F7FF0BD09D24000000FFFE87F7FF0B' + 'F7FF0BF7FF0BD09D24000000FFFE87F7FF0BD09D24FFFE87F7FF0B' + 'D09D24000000FFFE87F7FF0BF7FF0BF7FF0BD09D24000000FFFE87' + 'F7FF0BD09D24000000FFFE87F7FF0BF7FF0BF7FF0BF7FF0BF7FF0B' + 'F7FF0BF7FF0BF7FF0BF7FF0BD09D24000000000000FFFE87F7FF0B' + 'F7FF0BF7FF0BF7FF0BF7FF0BF7FF0BF7FF0BF7FF0BF7FF0BD09D24' + '000000000000000000FFFE87F7FF0B000000000000F7FF0B000000' + '000000F7FF0BD09D24000000000000000000000000FFFE87F7FF0B' + '000000F7FF0B000000F7FF0B000000F7FF0BD09D24000000000000' + '000000000000FFFE87F7FF0B000000F7FF0B000000F7FF0B000000' + 'F7FF0BD09D24000000000000000000000000D09D24D09D24D09D24' + 'D09D24D09D24D09D24D09D24D09D24D09D24000000000000'); SetMouseMode(false); ColorToleranceSpeed(1); Stopped := false; i := 0; //x := 628+random(10); //y := 269+random(6); x := 657+random(669-658); y := 324+random(331-326); if (FindColorSpiralTolerance(lolx, loly, vari, x1, y1, x2, y2, 5)) then begin writeln(inttostr(lolx)+' '+inttostr(loly)) end else begin stopped := true; exit; end; LClickSmooth(x,y,0,0); wait(200+random(200)); repeat LClickSmooth(x,y,0,0); wait(500+random(200)); repeat wait(50); CheckForMod; until(getcolor(732,175)=2829182); // until(FindColorTolerance(turhax, turhay, 4297634, 221, 116, 317, 217, 20)); wait(200+random(200)); LClickSmooth(x,y,0,0); wait(200+random(200)); turhax := 266; turhay := 172; repeat wait(100); CheckForMod; until(not(FindColorTolerance(turhax, turhay, vari, x1, y1, x2, y2, 5))); writeln('hialc-vÃ¤ri lÃ¶ydetty'); wait(200+random(200)); turhax := 266; turhay := 172; repeat wait(50); until(FindColorTolerance(lolx, loly, vari, lolx-10, loly-10, lolx+10, loly+10, 5)); writeln(inttostr(lolx)+' '+inttostr(loly)) wait(50+random(50)); 
writeln('hialc-vÃ¤ri meni pois');
CheckForMod;
if (i=20) then
begin
  PlaySound('aanibeep.wav');
  i := 0;
end;
if (IsFunctionKeyDown(0)) then
begin
  stopped := true;
end;
i := i + 1;

until(stopped);
end.[/center]
